org.dyn4j.dynamics.contact

Class ContactPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dyn4j.dynamics.contact.ContactPoint
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PersistedContactPoint, SolvedContactPoint

    public class ContactPoint
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a contact point and used to report events via the ContactListener.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    3.1.2
    Author:
    William Bittle

        depth - the penetration depth
